attributes.magic: DOS batch file, ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET MALWARE Single char EXE direct download likely trojan (multiple families)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE Single char EXE direct download likely trojan (multiple families)"; flow:established,to_server; http.uri; content:".exe"; nocase; fast_pattern; pcre:"/\/[a-z0-9A-Z]\.exe$/i"; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2018581; rev:4; metadata:created_at 2014_06_18, signature_severity Major, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2020_08_17;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: TGI HUNT Exe File Served by Python SimpleHTTP Server
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http any any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"TGI HUNT Exe File Served by Python SimpleHTTP Server"; flow:established,from_server; http.server; content:"SimpleHTTP/"; file_data; content:"MZ"; within:2; content:"PE|00 00|"; distance:0; classtype:attempted-admin; sid:2610676; rev:1;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET DROP Spamhaus DROP Listed Traffic Inbound group 58
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ip [212.11.64.0/24,212.224.93.0/24,212.237.152.0/21,213.21.237.0/24,213.177.179.0/24,213.190.14.0/24,213.209.159.0/24,216.7.96.0/20,216.9.224.0/22,216.63.240.0/22,216.93.96.0/19,216.137.144.0/20,216.179.128.0/17,216.240.96.0/20,216.250.16.0/20,217.60.24.0/22,217.60.60.0/22,217.60.239.0/24,217.60.242.0/24,217.60.246.0/24] any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET DROP Spamhaus DROP Listed Traffic Inbound group 58"; reference:url,www.spamhaus.org/drop/drop.txt; threshold: type limit, track by_src, seconds 3600, count 1; classtype:misc-attack; flowbits:set,ET.Evil; flowbits:set,ET.DROPIP; sid:2400057; rev:4587; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Any, deployment Perimeter, tag Dshield, signature_severity Minor, created_at 2010_12_30, updated_at 2026_01_14;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Executable Download from dotted-quad Host
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Executable Download from dotted-quad Host"; flow:established,to_server; http.uri; content:".exe"; endswith; nocase; http.host; content:"."; offset:1; depth:3; content:"."; within:4; content:"."; within:4; pcre:"/^(?:\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}$/"; http.request_line; content:".exe HTTP/1."; fast_pattern; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2016141; rev:9; metadata:attack_target Client_and_Server, created_at 2013_01_03, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Significant, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_04_09;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING SUSPICIOUS Dotted Quad Host MZ Response
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET HUNTING SUSPICIOUS Dotted Quad Host MZ Response"; flow:established,to_client; flowbits:isset,http.dottedquadhost; file_data; content:"MZ"; within:2; content:"PE|00 00|"; distance:0; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2021076; rev:2; metadata:created_at 2015_05_08, confidence Medium, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2019_07_26;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Windows Powershell User-Agent Usage
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Windows Powershell User-Agent Usage"; flow:established,to_server; http.user_agent; content:"Mozilla/"; startswith; content:") WindowsPowerShell/"; distance:0; fast_pattern; classtype:not-suspicious; sid:2033355; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2021_07_16, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2021_07_16;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Request for EXE via Powershell
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Request for EXE via Powershell"; flow:established,to_server; http.method; content:"GET"; http.uri; content:".exe"; endswith; nocase; http.user_agent; content:"WindowsPowerShell/"; fast_pattern; reference:md5,38135f6de7042fa63df183671b09a5ee; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2043337; rev:2; metadata:attack_target Client_and_Server, created_at 2023_01_19, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2023_04_20;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SSLBL: Malicious JA3 SSL-Client Fingerprint detected (CoinMiner)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls any any -> any any (msg:"SSLBL: Malicious JA3 SSL-Client Fingerprint detected (CoinMiner)"; ja3_hash; content:"40adfd923eb82b89d8836ba37a19bca1"; reference:url, sslbl.abuse.ch/ja3-fingerprints/40adfd923eb82b89d8836ba37a19bca1/; sid:906200068; rev:1;)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Registry Persistence via Service in Safe Mode
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the modification of the registry to allow a driver or service to persist in Safe Mode.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Remote Access Tool - Potential MeshAgent Execution - Windows
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects potential execution of MeshAgent which is a tool used for remote access.
Historical data shows that threat actors rename MeshAgent binary to evade detection.
Matching command lines with the '--meshServiceName' argument can indicate that the MeshAgent is being used for remote access.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via CommandLine
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: James Pemberton / @4A616D6573, Endgame, JHasenbusch, oscd.community, Austin Songer @austinsonger

threat_severity.level_description: Severity MEDIUM because it was considered trojan.
